B1 someone whose job is to give advice to people about the law and speak for them in court: I want to see my lawyer before I say anything.
More examplesFewer examplesShe's hired a lawyer who specializes in divorce cases.Our lawyer thinks that we have a very good case.Millions of dollars were spent on lawyers in a courtroom showdown between the two companies.The report notes that 40 percent of lawyers entering the profession are women.If you're unsure of your legal rights, I would check with a lawyer.

someone whose job is to give advice about the law and prepare court cases or speak for one side of a case in court: He refused to say anything until he had seen his lawyer. A lawyer for the company said there were grounds to appeal the ruling.defence/prosecution lawyer The family hired a prominent defence lawyer.
